channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: RSA News: What's new in Defender XDR?
item.description: In today's threat landscape, the realm of cyberattacks is in a constant state of flux, evolving at an unprecedented pace. Attack vectors, methodologies, and vulnerabilities are continuously changing, presenting a formidable challenge to cybersecurity teams worldwide. To effectively combat this ever-changing landscape of attacks, security teams must equip themselves with tools that are innovating and adapting based on new threats. Foundational security tools play a crucial role in modern security and they must continuously invest in improving and enhancing their offerings to ensure they remain ...
